ygData.subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Hello
ygData.msgSnippet: Actually Rodcet seems to be the premiere gay server Some of the highest level, most uber people on the server have turned out to be family.  And while they
ygData.messageBody:
Actually Rodcet seems to be the premiere gay server

Some of the highest level, most uber people on the server have turned out to
be family. And while they aren't willing to leave the guilds they are
accustomed to, they have helped some of us out and I have even started being
able to group with a lot of them.. :P)


----- Original Message -----
From: "Jose Muela" <redspieder@...>
To: <EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Tuesday, January 30, 2001 7:06 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Hello


> yes, you are doing well, you have to imagine, we are a minority as is and
> now we are playing a game where we are a SUPER minority IMO if you have 7
to
> 10 or more poeple on at the same time on avrage then that is a large guild
> for a GLBT guild!! keep up the good work, i just wish i could abandon my
> main to be able to play on a server with a GLBT guild but i just cant
bring
> myself to do it, i will play my alt on rodcet nife rarely but when i do i
> enjoy it
>
>
> >From: Terry Walker <mellowtigger@...>
> >Reply-To: EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com
> >To: EQ_rainbow@yahoogroups.com
> >Subject: Re: [EQ_rainbow] Hello
> >Date: Tue, 30 Jan 2001 17:40:52 -0600
> >
> > >Yes I believe Rodcet is the largest collection of players
> >
> >I'm curious what a "large collection" means in "gay EQ" terms. I keep
> >trying
> >to compare our new guild with the uber-guilds on The Nameless server and
of
> >course we come up short. But we usually have around 4 people online,
with
> >as
> >many as 10. Last weekend, I think, we grouped with our guildfriends (The
> >Nameless of Mercy) at SolA and we had enough people to completely fill 2
> >party groups. I think that's an exceptional headcount for a guild that's
> >still less than half a year old.
> >
> >Cure my feelings of inadequacy as guildleader. Tell me we're doing well
on
> >the "headcount" test. Heh.
> >
> >- SoulDreamer, Nameless Love guild, The Nameless server
> >
>
